custom_fields.description:
Specifies the number of buffer days allowed in the current month to submit expense claims for the previous month.
For example, if this value is set to 5, employees can create expense claims for the previous month only until the 5th day of the current month. After that, expense claims dated in the previous month will not be allowed.
custom_fields.label: Buffer Days For Previous Month Expense
custom_fields.name: HR Settings-custom_buffer_days_for_previous_month_expense
